mapper.update: UPDATE pv_stats SET true_times= true_times+1 , times=times+(#{randomNum}) WHERE date=#{date}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(user.id) as user_num FROM user
SELECT pv_stats.date as date FROM pv_stats ORDER BY pv_stats.date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT pv_stats.date as date, pv_stats.times as today FROM pv_stats WHERE pv_stats.date=#{date}
SELECT SUM(pv_stats.times) as total FROM pv_stats

SELECT a.uid as userId, a.user_name AS userName, a.avatar_file AS userPhoto, a.sex AS sex, a.province AS province, a.city AS city, b.signature AS signature FROM aws_itui_users a JOIN aws_itui_users_attrib b ON a.uid=b.uid WHERE a.is_recommend=1

SELECT a.id AS newsId, a.title AS title, a.add_time AS unixTime, substring(a.message,1,80) AS summary, max(b.file_location) AS newsPhoto FROM aws_itui_article a JOIN aws_itui_attach b ON a.id = b.item_id WHERE a.is_headline=1 GROUP BY b.item_id ORDER BY a.add_time DESC
SELECT a.topic_id AS topicId, a.topic_title AS topic FROM aws_itui_topic a WHERE a.is_recommend=1 LIMIT 12
SELECT a.school_name AS userSchool, a.degree AS degree FROM aws_itui_education_experience a WHERE a.uid = #{userId} ORDER BY a.education_years DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.uid AS userId, a.user_name AS userName, a.avatar_file AS userPhoto, a.url_token as urlToken FROM aws_itui_users a WHERE a.uid=#{userId} AND a.user_name=#{userName} AND a.password=#{password}
